platen-styled_text-image.title: Styled Text
platen-styled_text-image.description: Add text in a styled span element.

fields.name: selection
fields.title: Text: This is the text for the span itself. The text may be any inline Markdown.

fields.name: style
fields.title: Style: Specify the name of the style to use, if any. Alternatively, specify the dot-path of the preset you want to use after the prefix `preset:`, like `preset:foo`.

fields.name: class
fields.title: Class List: Specify any classes to add to the span in a space-separated list. To specify classes with the default style, set style to '.'
